title: What a Blast.
text: It was thrilling and exciting! Category 3 & 4 rapids were amazing. Our guide was Daniel and he made our trip perfect. He navigated the boat like a pro. Thanks Daniel for taking great care of us and insuring everyone had a blast!

title: What a great hike!
text: Beautiful hiking in the nature. The Falls are worth the hike. The good news is this wonderful hike through the woods is not to far from Gatlinburg, TN.
placeLocation: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

title: Great Adventure in the mountains
text:
Moose creek ranch is awesome. Tucked away in the mountains. The horses were all well trained and did not act up. We had friends that had not ridden for 50 years and they had a great time and felt safe on the horse they chose for them. It was great to actually go thru the woods up and down the mountains. Our guide was great!
After the ride there was a great picnic spot for lunch.

title: Great Vineyard with a great atmosphere
text: Great place to unwind after a great ride on the Virginia Creeper with friends on a lovely day! you will love this place right on the river bank.

title: Delicious Food
text: We enjoyed the quanta atmosphere - the house turned into restaurant. My dinner was great chili salmon. Great flavor.

title: Amazing place
text: There is nothing like stepping back in time and seeing things thousands of years old, chock-full of history and amazing views.

title: Walking trip of Athens
text: What a great trip behind the scenes. Places they don’t tell you about. We loved it and and highly recommend it. The tour guide was very knowledgeable of the history of Athens.

title: Delicious with a view!
text: No matter if you coming for breakfast lunch or dinner you would enjoy this place delicious food with view.

title: Loved this place
text: Whether it was for dinner or for a late night snack they have great food with an unbelievable view of the Aegean Sea!!!

title: Amazing place on the Aegean Sea on the cliffs.
text: Lots of restaurants on the water, great walk on the cliffs, shore and great swimming in clean, clear water. If you feel ambitious feel free to jump off the cliff from Saint Nicholas island or right where you are. It’s an exhilarating amazing experience!

title: Great time on the water seeing the views of Santorini
text: We departed at 3:00, almost immediately they gave you a glass of wine and asked you just to relax & enjoy yourself. We stop by 3 stops to swim or snorkel and then we did have a delicious barbecue on the boat and watched a beautiful sunset in Santorini. Breathtaking, I will say! The crew was awesome. The people on the boat were a lot of fun also! What a great experience so glad we did it!

title: What a Hike
text: What a hike - You could take the easy way up to the top of Herod's palace by taking the cable car or you could hike it. What an amazing sight to behold and learn the awesome history behind the palace. This was a pop up for our itinerary for Israel - it was awesome!!! Afterwards head to the Dead Sea for a nice float!

title: Awesome way to start our day in Beautiful Savannah!
text: I can’t think of a better way to start your day in beautiful Savannah then on a Pedicab adventure. Our server in the Marriott told us about how great if you wanted to see the city up and personal. We had never been on one of those before. Well Randy who has worked for the company for 5 years was chock full of information just what we needed to learn about this lovely city. Thanks again Randy made our tour extremely entertaining.

title: Paradise
text: We loved the Ziva Hyatt. Wow, what a place, the turquoise water takes your breath away - from your room and the beach. The food and many restaurants on property were delicious. We loved our Butler's Joseph an Angel. Juliana who took care of our rooms Rocked. We did go to the Thai restaurant off the property and that was delicious also! The spa staff was heavenly. Elizabeth was there..thank you. We enjoyed all the outdoor staff... we play volleyball, tennis, they had bikes to ride with an escorte...sweet... we also enjoyed the bike riding in the pool class There was so much to do there, it was a great way to celebrate a wedding and have a terrific vacation. At was fun to dance under the stars at the cool roof top pool bar. Loved Cuban night and oldies night. BTW... The gazebo on the water for the wedding was gorgeous was the icing on the cake!

title: Good morning
text: We had an awesome server named Linda. I had egg quesadillas, they were delicious with fresh tomatoes. Everyone in our party had plenty in the place to eat and Linda made it extra special!

title: A Rainy Night
text: Despite not having reservations on a very rainy night Saturday night we had a delightful dinner at the restaurant - we have tried to make reservations previously but could not get in. I had the Halibut (from Seward Alaska - great place to visit) and my husband tried the Shrimp and Grits- (over the Top) - We both loved our meals! Great experience with our server Sara - Thanks for a very nice evening! :)

title: Not what you expect...
text: Last year we popped in for breakfast and it became our favorite breakfast place besides Lost Dog. The Food is fresh and delicious! You will love it!

title: Hospitality at it's finest with great food!
text: We love visiting this restaurant - so nice when one of the owners, Eli - takes his time to come by and say Hello. The food is always the best - loved the salmon with shrimp and always a to-go bag. Thanks for always being Great and taking care of your customers...oh yea...it was nice to sit in Billy Joel's seat! :)

title: What a great day in West Palm on Segway's
text: Thank you Patrick for making our adventure on Segway's adventure very enjoyable. Your patience was greatly appreciated. Loved the history of the area. Thanks a bunch!

title: Delicious food in the Big City
text: Our family enjoyed the excellent Italian food. We were very pleased - my son especially loved the homemade lasagna - it filled his whole plate!

title: Amazing!!
text: What a gorgeous property. From the moment we stepped on the property the staff made us feel so welcome. We loved our Butler Santo - he make everything so perfect. The perperty also try very hard to have good entertainment, great, fun music to dance to under the stars. I love the zumba and the volleyball everyday! They made sure we had the best 30th wedding anniversary ever!

title: Not what you expect!
text: I was surprised with the quality of food and the quantity of food for the price. For having to wait two months for this reservation, that was crazy! There are so many other awesome restaurants in Charleston.

title: Great sunset view!
text: We enjoyed the roof top lounge... It was excellent to watch the sunset and enjoy the great view of the city!

title: Great Experience!
text: From our rooms to the dining room - everyone was exceptional - loved the staff and the GM! We loved celebrating JB Driscoll graduation there. This is wonderful property because it is in walking distance to great restaurants.

title: Great place!
text: We loved walking in the Market Square. It was nice after dinner listening to music and singing on the stage. Don't forget to try Rita's for dessert - pretty yummy!
